physical_examinations.vital_signs: Weight: 3.7 kg; APGAR score: 9/10 at 1 minute
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pale, dehydrated, hypoactive appearance; paralyzed and swollen right arm; excessive crying on moving the right shoulder; flat anterior fontanelle; distended abdomen with visible dilated vein and hepatomegaly; normal heart sounds S1 and S2; left arm and right leg intact and active.
